Package library

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BookStatus Provide an interface for state pattern of book status
    Command Provide an interface for command pattern
    MemberStatus Provide an interface for state pattern of member status
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Book Provide a class related to methods for books
    BookStatusAvailable "Available" state of a book
    BookStatusBorrowed "Borrowed" state of a book
    BookStatusOnhold "Onhold" state of a book
    CmdArrive "arrive" command
    CmdCancelRequest "cancelRequest" command
    CmdCheckin "checkin" command
    CmdCheckout "checkout" command
    CmdListBooks "listBooks" command
    CmdListMembers "listMembers" command
    CmdRegister "register" command
    CmdRequest "request" command
    CmdStartNewDay "startNewDay" command
    Day Provide a class with methods related to date events in the library
    Library Provide a class for the library instance in the library system
    Main The main program
    Member Provide a class related to methods for members
    MemberStatusNormal "Normal" state of a member
    MemberStatusSuspend "Suspend" state of a member
    RecordedCommand Provide a class for recorded command that allow redo/undo of commands
    SystemDate Provide a class for system date of the library
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExAlreadyRequested Exception for when a book is already requested
    ExBookIDAlreadyInUse Exception for when a book id is already in use
    ExBookIsAvailable Exception for when a book is already available
    ExBookIsBorrowedByThisMember Exception for when a book is already borrowed
    ExBookNotAvailable Exception for when a book is on hold and not available
    ExBookNotFound Exception for when a book id is not found
    ExDayNotValid Exception for when a date is not valid
    ExInsufficientCommand Exception for when insufficient command parameters are inputted
    ExLoanQuotaExceeded Exception for when a member's loan quota is exceeded
    ExMemberIDAlreadyInUse Exception for when a member id is already in use
    ExMemberNotFound Exception for when a member id is not found
    ExMemberStatusSuspended Exception for when a member is suspended
    ExNotBorrowedByThisMember Exception for when a book is not borrowed by a member
    ExRequestQuotaExceeded Exception for when a member's request quota is exceeded
    ExRequestRecordNotFound Exception for when a book request is not found
    ExUnknownCommand Exception for when an invalid command is inputted
